jobs.jobTitle: Robotic process automation (RPA) - Blue Prism Developer
jobs.description:
● Identifying new process opportunities and accurately analyzing and estimating new processes, quickly assessing feasibility.
● Analyzing, understanding and documenting the business processes in detail where required.
● Identifying and communicating the technical infrastructure requirements.
● Configuring new Blue Prism processes and objects using core workflow principles that are efficient, well structured, maintainable and easy to understand.
● Creating and maintaining solution documentation.
● Supporting existing processes and implementing change requirements as part of a structured change control process.
● Mentoring colleagues through the Blue Prism training and accreditation program providing advice and guidance on best practice and development techniques
● Problem solving issues that arise in day to day running of Blue Prism processes and providing timely responses and solutions as required.
● Communicating with Blue Prism on software related issues, suggested improvements and participating with other users in the Blue Prism community.

jobs.jobTitle: Senior Consultant – Robotic Process Automation, RPA CoE
jobs.description:
Part of PwC India RPA CoE Team as a Blue Prism certified RPA consultant. Key expertise are RPA implementation, streamlining complex business processes and providing tangible benefits to clients in terms of cost reduction and efficiency gain. Have effectively managed project delivery, covering process assessment, solution design, robo development, testing and go live phases.

KEY SKILLS -

# Expert in formulating strategy for Robotic Process Automation (RPA) implementation in banking business with hands-on solution design and implementation experience. 

# Strong leadership and team management skills  having led cross-functional teams in different geographies.

# Subject matter expert on OTC derivatives settlement and reconciliation with good understanding of OTC products across asset classes.

# Strong analytical skills and well versed with identifying patterns and data trends to utilized these in  process Improvement / Re-engineering and productivity ptimization for operation processes.

# Blue Prism Certified Robotic Process Automation expert.

Operation manager covering North America OTC settlement team for a leading US Investment bank.  Managed  team of 40+ members  spread across multiple sub-processes of  Settlements and Reconciliation for FID, Equity and FX products.

Worked on projects related to process automation, process re-engineering, risk and control assessment and change management delivering cost and efficiency gain for clients.

KEY RESULT AREAS -

# Responsible for day to day operations management of North America  OTC settlement silo with key focus on client relationship, productivity benefit, risk mitigation and staff development.

# Implemented strategic initiatives, driven cost & benefit optimization projects with help of process automation, process improvements/re-engineering, Lean and DMAIC implementation.

# Evaluated operation risk in the processes by devising effective control and deep diving into the risk incidents to identify root cause and corresponding eradication/mitigation plans.

# Driven risk meetings  to govern key risk items. Managing escalations and engaging follow ups with regional trade support groups, Middle Office teams, cash management  and other remote teams for timely closure of KRIs.

# Governed the knowledge management framework to proactively identify knowledge gaps and ensured adequate knowledge transfer taking place for new staff.

# Conducted performance appraisal and chalked out development plans for direct reports to help them improve their skills.

# Liaised with HR, Facilities, Training, IT & Network teams to ensure seamless operations delivery.

general.headline: Strategic & Leadership Hiring
general.description:
I look at my career like a race. The finish line is retirement (although I doubt I ever will
      retire). I want the race to be exciting and challenging.  Specialties: Strategic
      
      recruitment,Technical recruitment, Market Research, Sourcing methods,

jobs.description:
	Handling all Strategic Accounts, Support and Leadership Hiring across verticals.
	Developing a resourcing strategy which delivers the right quantity and quality of resources
	Work closely with the Senior Leadership to understand their staffing needs & strategizing with them to target relevant talent from industry.
	Attracting a talent pool with the aim of establishing an “Employee first” status scrutinize & provide the first level of candidate screening
	Negotiate remunerations, roll out offers, and prepare employment contracts.
	Working with Function Heads, Business Managers and Recruitment head to define and manage hiring plans and develop hiring strategies.
	Identify process improvements, cost saving initiatives, document and raise with business for approval.
	Developing and monitor the performance of various channels of recruitment & maintaining appropriate Channel mix.
	Proven ability to manage a team, solve problems, determine priorities and meet agreed deadlines. 
	Ability to act quickly, flexibly and pro-actively in response to emerging or unexpected events and anticipated hiring needs.
	Provide hiring update to business heads on weekly & monthly basis, through hiring reports, dashboards, etc., providing insight to the hiring numbers & costs involved, along with challenges faced, and discuss effective solutions to mitigate them.
	Take care of hiring within own team, maintain their optimal performance with periodic reviews, and focus on their individual development & career enhancement

- Recruitment and Selection of qualified and suitable candidates for various positions in the organization based on the approved manpower budget.
- Manpower Planning and recruitment  scheduling
- Coordinate in advertisement Costing / Forecasting 
- Co-ordination with interview panel and fixing up interviews
- Participate in conducting Interview Tests / Evaluations
- Ensure timely issue of offer letters 
- Maintain and update external recruitment data bank 
- Facilitate induction of newly joined employees
- Ensuring new employee’s bank account/SAP account  setup, collecting insurance coverage inputs and familiarizing the new employee to all organization policies and processes 
- Interact with head hunters / placement consultants for recruitment needs
- Ensure timely payments to advertisement agencies / placement consultants
- Coordinate in walk-in interviews
- Background checks and verifications

Dealing with the Clients and developing Business 
- Have been involved in research and recruitments of middle and top level positions
- Work on making JDs & briefing documents
- Internet recruiting on Job Portals and the databank for posting jobs, Searching candidates, making and saving search agents etc.
- Working on retained search and screening for best candidates for top level positions for clients
- Conducting phone screens to determine if candidates are general fits with our opportunities as well as reviewing technical skills
- Initial Interview of the Candidate as per Client Requirement

·To achieve the target assigned within agreed quality & timelines. 
· Independently manage recruitment for an account/function.  
·Co-ordinate / liaison with placement consultants / institutions etc.
·Conducting skill testing & interviews
·Planning & strategizing for project specific recruitment within defined time frames.
·Ensuring that documentation and salary fitment as per agreed guidelines
·Contribute to creating an organizational image, which would help in attracting and recruiting the best talent
·Seek to expand the talent pool by evaluating new employee profiles and assess their suitability for IBM-Daksh

*Handling Team of Two members.

general.headline: Head Intelligent Automation ( Emerging Tech, RPA, Artificial Intelligence)
general.description:
I have over 20 years of professional services experience with key focus areas around RPA , Machine Learning and AI, Finance and IT transformation in GICs, Performance enablement in captives/Shared services, enabling governance structures for clients to operate in a partner enabled IT operating model and co-innovation with technology partners. I have been working with large global enterprise clients who have GBS structures to leverage the latest developments in automation and cognitive to their benefit. 

I lead the Robotics and Cognitive Automation practice at KPMG in India. Additionally I also head Innovation and Investment for KPMG in India where I ensure that the firms solutions are innovated to remain market relevant.  I am a trained IBM Watson Cognitive Value Assessor.

I started my career in Audit in 1998 March and moved to risk consulting to lead SOX for the Firm All India in 2002. I attended the Women World Banking Forum in Amsterdam where I mentor South African women entrepreneurs over a period of a year by imparting knowledge of Finance, IT ,HR etc.

jobs.description:
My focus is on consulting on Shared Services and Outsourcing space across large
      extended global enterprises.  I have been involved in designing "what's next" for large
      clients who have a GIC /GBS structure in India with the Parent Company in the US , UK
      or Germany and work in large global accounts and teams.  I focus on continued
      performance enablement of large corporations who would like to source talent or
      
      services from India primarily in Finance , FP& A and Technology support and services .

I specialise in Finance function transformation.  I lead a team of professionals to IT enable Finance functions to be better business partners. I am also responsible for developing client relationships and my aim is to be a trusted advisor.  In the current environment , it is difficult to achieve change without technology enablement and that is the key area I manage.
I was in charge of consolidation ,handling auditors and reported controllership.

• Had a very good knowledge on VB.Net.
• Helped client in reducing the cost by 60% and reduced headcount by 40%, by deploying 9 Bots into production.
• Determined training requirements and provided various training to strengthen the team to achieve the 
    goals globally.
• Quick learner and adaptive to new and challenging technological environments. Ability to work effectively as
    a  team member as well as an individual.
• Identifying and debugging the errors using Error Handlers

jobs.description:
•	Understand the business process of banking modules from RPA Blue Prism perspective to meet with client's specific business automate processes
•	Developing the process (from scratch) based on business flow in an efficient way. Working close with the client at the Client Location and proactively providing inputs to their business.
•	Creating and documenting Process definition document, High-level solution design document, Object design instruction document before the project, test plans and scenarios for the pre-UAT phases.
•	Developed configuring programs, scripts and objects that are efficient, well structured, maintainable and easy to understand
•	Doing Unit testing of the code and helping testers to perform System Integrating Testing and collaborating with the client to perform User Acceptance testing.
•	Problem solving issues that arise in day to day running of RPA processes and providing timely responses and solutions as required.
•	Post Production, supporting the client with change requests and fixing the bugs in production.
•	Supported existing processes and implementing change in requirements as part of a structured change control process.

•	Managing   & leading software developments in Financial Service India's delivery centers in relation to software robotics process automation.
•	Adept knowledge of Software Development Life cycle (SDLC) including Requirement gathering, Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, Deployment, Delivery and Support.;. 
•	Business Management insights with fair knowledge of Business Analysis, process analysis & discovery and Project Management and latest trends.

Software developments in IBM GPS India's delivery centres in relation to software robotics process automation ( Blue  prism ).  
•	Understanding  the   requirement & importance of automations. Creating   POC for an Internal  Offshore Team. Analysis the Business need & Preparing  Business Requirement Document.  Scope   Definition and Execution Strategy. 
•	Responsible for building projects using software blue prism to automate IT/Business Process end to end
•	Working with different roles like business analyse, developer, Process Administrator and testing in RPA (Robotic Process Automation) .  Automated OS technology like Windows OS, cloud technology like Citrix & some more applications like Oracle Applications, sap applications etc.
•	Developing and delivering automated systems across IBM to improve efficiency and reduce risk. Working under pressure to deliver innovative strategic solutions to complex problems and meet daily deadlines.
•	In depth knowledge of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and driving it for various clients in India and overseas.

Automation using various Development Tools ( UI PATH)(BLUE PRISM)
We had developed a automation workflow for (Domain: Telecom) and Order Process (Domain: Retail) using Development Tools called UI path, which helps the clients & associates to just key in the data’s given by the customers and the end results can be retrieved without navigating through any screen (manually).
Beginning, Associates were manually processing orders via their applications. And this had been a tedious and complicated task, since they need to navigate through many screens of an application. Also it takes more time to complete one case.
Our task is to ensure that the environment developed by us shouldn’t cause any deviation. Each and every task or object developed, needs to be tested under all circumstances before its being deployed for live functioning.
During the live functioning of the tool developed, our task is to check for the consistency of the tool and ensure that there is malfunctioning occurring after the deployment.
Handling the run time issues & bugs on time.

	Default Servicing: The team is responsible for servicing the US based delinquent loans on behalf of Citi mortgage.
	Part of Foreclosure – team, which enhances the selling of borrower’s property as a consequence of their contractual delinquency.
	Hands on experience in e-mails and application chat with the US. Interactions with the US attorneys over calls.
